settings.empty_message: You haven't viewed any products yet. Start browsing to see your history here.
settings.description_logged_out: Log in or create an account to see personalised product recommendations based on your browsing history.

settings.question: What's included in the box?
settings.answer: Please check the product description above for what's included. 'Bare Unit' means the tool body only — batteries, charger and case are sold separately or can be added via the Build & Save option.

settings.question: Is this covered by manufacturer warranty?
settings.answer: Yes. As an authorised dealer, all products come with full manufacturer warranty. We handle claims directly — just contact us with your order number.

settings.question: Can I collect from your store?
settings.answer: Yes! Click & Collect is available from both our Canterbury and Ramsgate branches. Orders are usually ready within 1 hour during opening hours.

settings.question: Do you offer trade accounts?
settings.answer: Yes — trade accounts come with 30-day payment terms, exclusive pricing and a dedicated account manager. Apply here.
